overview: 'Tune in, turn on...get off!'Visit the set of Alexa's hot new infomercial PORN-O-MATIC 2000, where the Wicked girl excels in the one thing no porn connoisseur can be without...sex! She slices, she dices, she swallows! Tune in to PORN-O-MATIC 2000 today!
tagline: It Slices! It Dices! It Swallows! ...and so much more!!
title: Porn-o-matic 2000
